In the video, VOICE TO THE STREET and Lighted Pearl Africa Foundation worked together to expose the children of Makoko, Lagos, Nigeria, to sellable and transferrable tech skills such as robotics, digital marketing, and product design.
Our goal is impact, and we achieved that.
